titles: Ioyfull and happie newes from the west of Ireland sent in three letters from persons of note ...
author: Saintliger, W. (William), Sir, d. 1642.
Ford, Edward, 17th cent.
Whetcombe, Tristram.
publisher: Printed for Francis Cowles and Thomas Bates,
notes: The first letter is signed (p. [3]) W. St. Lieger, the second is signed (p. [8]) Tristram Whitcombe, the third is signed (p. [8]) Edw. Ford.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
